001package io.github.ai4ci.flow;
002
003import java.util.Iterator;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
006import java.util.OptionalLong;
007import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue;
008import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;
009
010import org.slf4j.Logger;
011import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
012
013import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Outbreak;
014import io.github.ai4ci.config.execution.ExecutionConfiguration;
015import io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.SetupConfiguration;
016import io.github.ai4ci.util.Cloner;
017import io.github.ai4ci.util.PauseableThread;
018
019/**
020 * Factory for pre-configuring and caching simulation instances for batch
021 * execution.
022 *
023 * <p>
024 * This class operates as a daemon thread that prepares and caches configured
025 * {@link Outbreak} simulations before they are executed by
026 * {@link SimulationExecutor}. It handles the computationally intensive setup
027 * phase separately from execution to optimize resource utilization and enable
028 * parallel execution.
029 *
030 * <h2>Factory Workflow</h2>
031 * <ol>
032 * <li><b>Setup Configuration</b>: Creates base outbreak models from setup
033 * configurations</li>
034 * <li><b>Execution Configuration</b>: Applies execution parameters to create
035 * runnable simulations</li>
036 * <li><b>Caching</b>: Maintains a cache of ready-to-execute simulations</li>
037 * <li><b>Delivery</b>: Provides simulations to {@link SimulationMonitor} for
038 * execution</li>
039 * </ol>
040 *
041 * <h2>Configuration Matrix</h2>
042 * <p>
043 * The factory generates simulations for all combinations of setup and execution
044 * configurations, creating a complete experimental design matrix: \[
045 * N_{\text{simulations}} = N_{\text{setups}} \times N_{\text{executions}} \]
046 *
047 * <h2>Caching Strategy</h2>
048 * <p>
049 * Uses a size-aware caching approach:
050 * <ul>
051 * <li>Default cache size: {@link SimulationFactory#CACHE_SIZE} simulations</li>
052 * <li>Automatic memory estimation using
053 * {@link Cloner#estimateSize(Object)}</li>
054 * <li>Dynamic cache size adjustment based on available memory</li>
055 * <li>Pause/resume behavior to prevent memory exhaustion</li>
056 * </ul>
057 *
058 * <h2>Integration with SimulationMonitor</h2>
059 * <p>
060 * The factory coordinates closely with {@link SimulationMonitor}:
061 * <ul>
062 * <li>Notifies monitor when simulations are ready for execution</li>
063 * <li>Responds to monitor requests for simulation delivery</li>
064 * <li>Accepts cache size adjustments from monitor based on system
065 * resources</li>
066 * <li>Reports status and progress to monitor for oversight</li>
067 * </ul>
068 *
069 * <h2>Performance Optimization</h2>
070 * <p>
071 * Key optimizations include:
072 * <ul>
073 * <li>Model cloning to avoid redundant setup computations</li>
074 * <li>Memory-efficient caching with size awareness</li>
075 * <li>Background thread operation to overlap setup with execution</li>
076 * <li>Batch processing of configuration combinations</li>
077 * </ul>
078 *
079 * @see SimulationMonitor
080 * @see SimulationExecutor
081 * @see Outbreak
082 * @see SetupConfiguration
083 * @see ExecutionConfiguration
084 */
085public class SimulationFactory extends PauseableThread {
086
087        /** Default cache size for pre-configured simulations */
088        public static int CACHE_SIZE = 2;
089
090        static Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SimulationFactory.class);
091
092        /**
093         * Starts the simulation factory with the provided configuration sets.
094         *
095         * <p>
096         * Creates a complete experimental design by generating simulations for all
097         * combinations of setup and execution configurations.
098         *
099         * @param setups     list of setup configurations for model structure
100         * @param executions list of execution configurations for run parameters
101         * @param urnBase    base URN pattern for simulation identification
102         * @param mon        the simulation monitor that will execute the generated
103         *                   simulations
104         * @return a started SimulationFactory instance
105         */
106        public static SimulationFactory startFactory(
107                        List<SetupConfiguration> setups,
108                        List<ExecutionConfiguration> executions, String urnBase,
109                        SimulationMonitor mon
110        ) {
111
112                SimulationFactory tmp = new SimulationFactory(
113                                setups, executions, urnBase, mon
114                );
115                tmp.start();
116                return tmp;
117        }
118
119        SimulationMonitor mon;
120        volatile ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Outbreak> queue;
121        volatile AtomicInteger cacheSize = new AtomicInteger(CACHE_SIZE);
122        String urnBase;
123        long objSize = -1;
124        Iterator<Outbreak> builder;
125        int setupStage = 0;
126        int setupSize;
127        int execStage = 0;
128        int execSize;
129
130        String activity = "starting";
131
132        /**
133         * Constructs a simulation factory for the given configuration sets.
134         *
135         * <p>
136         * Initializes the factory with configuration matrices and prepares the
137         * iterator that will generate all simulation combinations.
138         *
139         * @param setups     list of setup configurations
140         * @param executions list of execution configurations
141         * @param urnBase    base URN pattern for simulation identification
142         * @param mon        the simulation monitor for coordination
143         */
144        private SimulationFactory(
145                        List<SetupConfiguration> setups,
146                        List<ExecutionConfiguration> executions, String urnBase,
147                        SimulationMonitor mon
148        ) {
149
150                super("Simulation factory", 10);
151
152                this.queue = new ConcurrentLinkedQueue<>();
153                this.setupSize = setups.size();
154                this.execSize = executions.size();
155                this.urnBase = urnBase;
156                this.mon = mon;
157
158                this.builder = new Iterator<>() {
159
160                        ExecutionBuilder setupBuilder;
161
162                        int count = 0;
163
164                        @Override
165                        public boolean hasNext() {
166                                return this.count < setups.size() * executions.size();
167                        }
168
169                        @Override
170                        public Outbreak next() {
171
172                                int setup = this.count / executions.size();
173                                int exec = this.count % executions.size();
174
175                                if (!this.hasNext())
176                                        throw new NoSuchElementException("Iterator exhausted");
177
178                                SimulationFactory.this.execStage = exec;
179                                SimulationFactory.this.setupStage = setup;
180
181                                if (exec == 0) {
182                                        // Click back to new setup
183                                        SetupConfiguration setupCfg = setups.get(setup);
184                                        SimulationFactory.this.activity = "building new model: "
185                                                        + setupCfg.getName() + ":" + setupCfg.getReplicate();
186                                        this.setupBuilder = new ExecutionBuilder(setupCfg);
187                                        this.setupBuilder.setupOutbreak(urnBase);
188                                }
189
190                                {
191                                        ExecutionBuilder builder2;
192                                        if (SimulationFactory.this.execSize > 1) {
193                                                if (SimulationFactory.this.objSize == -1) {
194                                                        SimulationFactory.this.activity = "sizing model";
195                                                        try {
196                                                                SimulationFactory.this.objSize = Cloner
197                                                                                .estimateSize(this.setupBuilder.outbreak);
198                                                                log.info(
199                                                                                "Each simulation takes up about " + String.format(
200                                                                                                "%1.0f",
201                                                                                                ((double) SimulationFactory.this.objSize)
202                                                                                                                / (1024 * 1024)
203                                                                                ) + "Mb before configuration."
204                                                                );
205                                                        } catch (Exception e) {
206                                                                log.error(
207                                                                                "Could't establish initial simulation size. It is possibly too big to be cloned."
208                                                                );
209                                                                SimulationFactory.this.objSize = 20 * 1024 * 1024;
210                                                        }
211                                                }
212                                                SimulationFactory.this.activity = "cloning model";
213                                                builder2 = this.setupBuilder
214                                                                .copy(SimulationFactory.this.objSize);
215                                        } else {
216                                                builder2 = this.setupBuilder;
217                                        }
218
219                                        ExecutionConfiguration exCfg = executions.get(exec);
220                                        SimulationFactory.this.activity = "initialising model baseline: "
221                                                        + exCfg.getName() + ":" + exCfg.getReplicate();
222                                        builder2.baselineModel(exCfg);
223                                        SimulationFactory.this.activity = "initialising model state: "
224                                                        + exCfg.getName() + ":" + exCfg.getReplicate();
225                                        builder2.initialiseStatus(exCfg);
226                                        SimulationFactory.this.activity = "model ready: "
227                                                        + exCfg.getName() + ":" + exCfg.getReplicate();
228
229                                        this.count += 1;
230
231                                        return builder2.build();
232                                }
233                        }
234
235                };
236        }
237
238        /**
239         * Checks if the simulation cache is full.
240         *
241         * @return true if the cache has reached its configured capacity
242         */
243        public boolean cacheFull() {
244                return this.queue.size() >= this.cacheSize.get();
245        }
246
247        /**
248         * Delivers a configured simulation for execution.
249         *
250         * @return a configured simulation or null if factory is finished or not
251         *         ready
252         */
253        Outbreak deliver() {
254                Outbreak out = this.queue.poll();
255                return out;
256        }
257
258        @Override
259        public void doLoop() {
260                if (this.cacheFull()) {
261                        this.pause();
262                } else {
263                        try {
264                                Outbreak tmp = this.builder.next();
265                                this.queue.add(tmp);
266                                this.mon.notifyFactoryReady(this);
267                        } catch (Exception e) {
268                                this.mon.handle(e);
269                                this.halt();
270                        }
271                }
272
273        }
274
275        /**
276         * Checks if the factory has completed all simulations and the queue is
277         * empty.
278         *
279         * @return true if all simulations have been created and consumed
280         */
281        public boolean finished() {
282                return this.queue.isEmpty() && this.isComplete();
283        }
284
285        /**
286         * Gets the estimated size of a configured simulation.
287         *
288         * @return the rough size of a configured simulation if known, empty
289         *         otherwise
290         */
291        public OptionalLong getSimulationSize() {
292                if (this.objSize == -1) return OptionalLong.empty();
293                return OptionalLong.of(this.objSize);
294        }
295
296        /**
297         * Increases the simulation cache size to improve throughput.
298         *
299         * <p>
300         * Used when there is ample memory available and simulations are waiting for
301         * factory production. Larger cache sizes allow better overlap between setup
302         * and execution phases.
303         *
304         * @param items the new cache size capacity
305         */
306        public void increaseCacheSize(int items) {
307                this.cacheSize.set(items);
308        }
309
310        @Override
311        public boolean isComplete() { return !this.builder.hasNext(); }
312
313        /**
314         * Checks if the factory has ready-to-execute simulations available.
315         *
316         * @return true if the factory has simulations ready for execution
317         */
318        public boolean ready() {
319                return !this.queue.isEmpty();
320        }
321
322        @Override
323        public void setup() {
324                // nothing to do here
325        }
326
327        @Override
328        public void shutdown(boolean completedNormally) {
329                if (!completedNormally) {
330                        log.error("Simulation factory did not complete all simulations.");
331                        this.activity = "factory terminated without completing";
332                } else {
333                        this.activity = "all simulations built";
334                }
335
336        }
337
338        /**
339         * Provides detailed status information about factory progress.
340         *
341         * @return formatted status string with progress metrics and current activity
342         */
343        @Override
344        public String status() {
345                return String.format(
346                                "model %d/%d; execution %d/%d; queued %d/%d; %s - (%s)",
347                                this.setupStage + 1, this.setupSize, this.execStage + 1,
348                                this.execSize, this.queue.size(), this.cacheSize.get(),
349                                this.activity, super.status()
350                );
351        }
352
353        /**
354         * Unpauses the factory if cache is not full.
355         *
356         * <p>
357         * Only resumes production if there is capacity in the cache to avoid memory
358         * exhaustion from overproduction.
359         */
360        @Override
361        public void unpause() {
362                if (!this.cacheFull()) { super.unpause(); }
363        }
364}
